metadata.title: Concept Gaps Report: Graph Universe Thesis Evidence Mining
metadata.description: Analysis of gaps and weaknesses in evidence coverage for graph universe thesis concepts

critical_gaps.name: clap-noun-verb Agent CLI
critical_gaps.description: CNV pattern not explicitly implemented or documented in codebase
missing_evidence: No evidence of Rust clap library usage (expected for clap-noun-verb)
No explicit capability contract definitions per agent
No resource quota enforcement at CLI level
No tenant/agent identity binding in command structure
critical_gaps.root_cause: Current implementation is bash-based shell commands rather than Rust clap library with capability contracts
critical_gaps.impact: CNV represents agent-grade capability surface; bash implementation lacks formal capability binding
resolution_options: Option A: Implement explicit CNV layer on top of bash commands with capability contract specification
Option B: Migrate key coordination commands to Rust with clap library for formal capability surface
Option C: Document current bash CLI as proto-CNV with formal capability contract extensions
critical_gaps.owner_recommendation: Option C (documentation) immediately, followed by Option A (explicit CNV layer) in next phase

critical_gaps.name: Chicago TDD Tools 12-Phase Verification
critical_gaps.description: CTT and 12-phase verification pipeline not fully documented or implemented
missing_evidence: No reference to 'Chicago TDD Tools' system
Only 4 verification phases documented (claim, capacity, json_validity, timing_bounds)
Phase names beyond basic guard checking not documented
what_exists: CTT module mentioned for formal verification
Guard checking framework with 4 guard types
critical_gaps.root_cause: CTT mentioned but not fully defined; '12-phase' pipeline referenced conceptually but not implemented
critical_gaps.impact: CTT is meant to be central verification engine; incomplete specification weakens thesis credibility
resolution_options: Option A: Define full 12-phase pipeline with explicit phase descriptions and sequence
Option B: Implement CTT module explicitly in coordination_helper.sh with phase tracking
Option C: Document the 12 phases conceptually with mapping to current 4-phase guard checking
critical_gaps.owner_recommendation: Option C immediately (document mapping), followed by Option A (full spec) and Option B (implementation)

major_gaps.name: Autonomic Hyper Intelligence
major_gaps.description: AHI concept present as patterns but not explicitly named or architecturally defined
missing_evidence: No explicit 'AHI' module or subsystem definition
MAPE pattern present but not integrated as 'AHI'
Autonomous decision engine mentioned but not formally specified
Policy adaptation mechanisms present but not attributed to AHI
what_exists: ΔQ evolution via invariant violation analysis
major_gaps.root_cause: Autonomic intelligence patterns implemented but not consolidated under 'AHI' umbrella
major_gaps.impact: AHI is meant to be governance layer managing policy evolution; unclear architecture reduces credibility
resolution_options: Option A: Document AHI as integration of MAPE + autonomous decision engine + policy adapter
Option B: Create explicit AHI module with clear API for policy generation and evolution
Option C: Rename MAPE/autonomic components to 'AHI' throughout codebase
major_gaps.owner_recommendation: Option A (documentation) immediately, followed by Option B (module definition)

major_gaps.name: Cleanroom Hermetic Testing
major_gaps.description: Hermetic testing patterns present but 'clnrm' module not explicitly implemented
missing_evidence: Weaver integration not found (expected for OTEL validation)
Hermetic test specification (OTEL TOML, span validation rules) not documented
No formal definition of hermeticity constraints
Integration with Weaver span graph validation not evident
what_exists: Worktree isolation with separate databases, configs, ports
major_gaps.root_cause: Hermetic testing principles implemented via infrastructure but 'clnrm' system not explicitly defined
major_gaps.impact: clnrm is meant to be central testing framework; absence of explicit module weakens architecture
resolution_options: Option A: Document clnrm specification with hermeticity criteria and Weaver integration points
Option B: Create clnrm as explicit bash module for hermetic test management
Option C: Integrate clnrm with OTEL span validation and Weaver live-checking
major_gaps.owner_recommendation: Option A (specification) immediately; parallel work on Options B and C

C_CODE_AS_PROJECTION.description: Fully documented with monoid homomorphism proof

C_MU_KERNEL_PHYSICS.description: Fully documented and implemented with 40+ commands

C_TIMING_BOUNDS_ENFORCED.description: Measured performance validates bounds; could add formal complexity proof

C_KNHK_GRAPH_PRIMARY.description: Formally defined; needs implementation reference examples

C_AHI_GOVERNANCE.description: Patterns present but architecture not explicit; see critical gaps

C_CTT_12_PHASE_VERIFICATION.description: Only 4 phases documented; full 12-phase pipeline missing; see critical gaps

C_CLNRM_HERMETIC_TESTING.description: Infrastructure present but module not explicit; see major gaps

C_CNV_AGENT_CLI.description: Bash CLI present but clap-style capability contracts missing; see critical gaps

C_NOMRG_GRAPH_OVERLAY.description: Fully documented with Van Kampen pushout topology

C_GGEN_PROJECTION_ENGINE.description: Implemented; could add formal projection specification for all artifact types

missing_formal_specifications.missing: Formal 12-phase pipeline specification with phase sequencing and guard criteria
missing_formal_specifications.impact: Cannot verify if implementation is complete

missing_formal_specifications.missing: Formal hermeticity specification with external-service bans and span validation rules
missing_formal_specifications.impact: Cannot characterize what constitutes 'hermetic' in this system

missing_formal_specifications.missing: Formal AHI architecture with explicit policy generation rules and ΔQ evolution criteria
missing_formal_specifications.impact: Cannot reason about autonomic governance properties

missing_module_implementations.missing: Explicit CTT module (ctt.sh or CTT command set)
missing_module_implementations.impact: Verification pipeline not packaged as cohesive system

missing_module_implementations.missing: Explicit clnrm module with hermeticity validation
missing_module_implementations.impact: Testing framework not unified under clnrm abstraction

missing_module_implementations.missing: Explicit AHI module integrating MAPE + policy evolution
missing_module_implementations.impact: Autonomic intelligence not packaged as governance layer

missing_module_implementations.missing: Explicit CNV layer with capability contract definitions
missing_module_implementations.impact: Agent CLI not formalized with security/quota semantics

missing_cross_system_integration.missing: Weaver integration with OTEL span graph validation
missing_cross_system_integration.impact: Cannot validate that telemetry spans satisfy hermeticity constraints

missing_cross_system_integration.missing: Explicit mapping of DFLSS phases to AHI policy evolution
missing_cross_system_integration.impact: Governance and optimization flows not formally integrated

missing_cross_system_integration.missing: Formal capability contract binding agents to μ-kernel operations
missing_cross_system_integration.impact: Agent capabilities not formally constrained by μ-kernel rules

evidence_quality_gaps.description: Papers use 'AHI' but codebase refers to components as 'MAPE', 'autonomic_engine', etc.
evidence_quality_gaps.resolution: Consolidate terminology; explicitly define AHI or rename components

evidence_quality_gaps.description: 'Chicago TDD Tools' never mentioned; only 'CTT' used without expansion
evidence_quality_gaps.resolution: Add explicit reference to Chicago TDD Tools system or clarify acronym

evidence_quality_gaps.description: CNV implies Rust clap library, but bash shell scripts used instead
evidence_quality_gaps.resolution: Either implement clap-based interface or document bash as proto-CNV

actions.description: Identify how 4 current guard phases map to 12-phase pipeline; document missing 8 phases
Document CNV as formal capability contract model; define what contracts should exist
Decide: rename MAPE/autonomic components to AHI, or rename AHI to MAPE; update all references
Write formal definition of 'hermetic' in SwarmSH context; list external service bans
Create coordination_helper.sh subcommand 'ctt' with 12-phase verification pipeline
actions.deliverable: ctt.sh or ctt_* functions in coordination_helper.sh

actions.description: Create ahi.sh or AHI subsystem integrating MAPE + policy evolution
actions.deliverable: ahi.sh with policy generation and evolution commands

actions.description: Add explicit capability contract enforcement on top of bash CLI
Create clnrm.sh for hermetic test management with OTEL validation
Add phase tracking to every μ-kernel operation; validate CTT phase sequencing
Explicitly map DFLSS phases to AHI policy generation; create joint workflow
Add OTEL span validation rules; integrate with live-checking via Weaver
Enforce capability contracts on μ-kernel operations; add quota checks per agent

path_to_target.action: Integrate clnrm with Weaver OTEL validation

gaps_vs_thesis_credibility.description: Gaps in CNV, CTT, AHI, clnrm weaken evidence for complete graph universe instantiation, but core thesis (Σ, Π, Γ, μ, τ) is fully supported

implementation_completeness.risk: Readers may doubt that SwarmSH is 'complete' instantiation if systems appear half-built

terminology_consistency.description: AHI, CTT, clnrm, CNV referenced but terms not consistently defined could confuse readers

summary_recommendations.action: Create explicit 12-phase CTT specification and implement module
summary_recommendations.rationale: CTT is central to verification claims; incomplete specification critical weakness

summary_recommendations.action: Define and implement explicit CNV capability contract layer
summary_recommendations.rationale: CNV represents agent-grade safety; bash-only implementation insufficient

summary_recommendations.action: Consolidate AHI terminology and implement governance module
summary_recommendations.rationale: Autonomic intelligence poorly defined; needs clear architecture

summary_recommendations.action: Formalize clnrm hermeticity specification with Weaver integration
summary_recommendations.rationale: Testing framework unclear; needs explicit definition

summary_recommendations.action: Cross-integrate all organ systems (CTT↔μ-kernel, AHI↔DFLSS, etc.)
summary_recommendations.rationale: Systems currently isolated; integration proves thesis of unified architecture
